name: Uta no Prince-sama: All Star
summary: Spin-off game of Uta no Prince-sama Debut. The main characters in this game are supporting roles in the main series.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: All Star After Secret
summary: Sequel of Uta no Prince-sama All Star, with the follow-up plot, same characters, and new songs.

name: Utopia Colony
summary: The year is 2033. You, an ex-Marine with little opportunities left, have signed up with Utopia Arura, a large mining corporation on Mars. They have sent you to a location they have proposed but you have chosen for mining. Everything else is up to you.

name: Utsurun Desu: Kawauso Hawaii he Iku!!!
summary:
While ostensibly a traditional platform game in which the player controls Kawauso-kun, the game has gained renown for being one of the earliest titles to attempt to break away from the video game conventions of the time. Among other convention-flouting novelties that the game offers are a series of fake title screens that the player must pass through at the start, and the allowance of the main character to traverse the background at times to bypass pits of spikes that otherwise appear impossible to cross.

In addition, the character's attack requires the player to hold down the attack button as the game cycles through the possible special moves with the more powerful attacks only highlighted for a short period of time.

name: Utawarerumono: ZAN 2
summary: Utawarerumono: ZAN 2 is a 3D Action RPG playstyle based on Utawarerumono: The Mask of Deception. Introducing new scenarios, the main story, "Hakuoro Arena," is based on Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth and told in a "military chronicle" style. You can play either solo or coop (up to four players online). This mode features exclusive enemies, maps, and more.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Debut for Nintendo Switch
summary: A port for Uta no Prince-sama Debut that was released in 2012 for PSP.

name: Utakata no Hana ga Chiru
summary:
Karen, head of the Literature Club, accompanied her childhood friend Himawari, from the Photography Club, to attend the drama club's training camp as a photographer.

At the training camp, twins Asagao and Yuugao asked Himawari to participate with them. After greeting each club member and being shown around the mansion, Karen and the others participate in the rehearsal as photographers.

The next day, a corpse is found in the mansion's greenhouse.

Is this an accident or an incident?

name: Utawarerumono: Zan
summary: Unveil a lost legend in a new light with Utawarerumono: ZAN! This action-packed brawler is a reimagination of the story of Haku, a man with no memories, and the great conflict that consumes the land he calls home. Take control of over 12 legendary heroes from the world of Utawarerumono, and utilize their unique strengths and abilities to engage hordes of enemies in ferocious melee combat. Venture through dynamic battlefields, unleash devastating special moves, and experience a grand tale of war and destiny.

name: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen
summary: A remake of the first Utawarerumono title featuring remastered artwork and battle sections are now in 3D. Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen is the first chapter of a tale years in the making. A man with no memories awakens in a strange world, and is taken in by a tribe of kindhearted beastfolk. He is raised as one of their own, eventually earning the name “Hakuowlo.” When neighboring nations begin to encroach on his homeland, Hakuowlo rises up against the tyrannical invaders, setting himself on an unforgettable journey that lives on in the songs of legend.

name: Utakata no Uchronia: Trail
summary: A fandisc for Illusion of Itehari, which includes sequel stories and alternative scenarios depicting the aftermath of the original game, as well as new routes for Hiiragi and Tsuwabuki.

name: Utaho no Tatari 2
summary: You wish for the complete truth. You are about to touch the curse again. On that fateful day, a few years after that incident, she was about to become a new victim. Afterall, her ordinary life is about to break. Search for the cursed truth. Learn everything. I can't help you anymore. You will die.

name: Utsuho's Great Hunger Battle
summary: This is a Touhou fangame and Utsuho Reiuji is the main character.

name: Ute
summary: Sleep with as many men as you can, and don't get caught!

name: Utopia
summary:
Utopia is a game played by two players on two continents. Players must build their island nation by building farms, housing, schools, hospitals, and factories and making other improvements while also competing against another player. Players are able to sabotage the other player as well, but they must also handle maintaining a fleet of PT boats to protect their fishing fleet, building forts to prevent rebellion, and dealing with the occasional hurricane.

Utopia is considered by some to be the first city-building game, and an early ancestor of the real-time strategy genre.

name: Uta no Prince-sama
summary: Uta no Prince-sama is a visual novel game published by Broccoli. Uta no Prince-sama is an otome game which has been adapted into manga, anime, drama CDs, music CDs, fanbooks and etc.

name: Utter a Name
summary: Utter a Name is a challenging detective adventure with strong emphasis on atmosphere and investigation. Several disembodied souls linger in the premises of an old manor. The goal is to explore the vicinity for information, then deduce the identities of the souls and their murderers.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Amazing Aria
summary: Spin-off of Uta no Prince-sama, of which characters are in A class in the main series. The game has addition plot of main story line, and contains mini games of new songs.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Repeat Love
summary: Remake work of Uta no Prince-sama Repeat, which has new voice, illustration, and songs, and the gaming system was upgraded.

name: Utter a Name
summary: Utter a Name is a challenging detective adventure with strong emphasis on atmosphere and investigation. The goal is to investigate a small manor and deduce the identities of several disembodied souls and their murderers.

name: Utopia
summary: Utopia is a 2D top-down view barrage shooting RPG game played alone. The protagonist sets out on a journey to face various threats that befall the utopia world. Fight against a variety of incoming enemies and save the utopia world!

name: Utakata no R: Kako-hen Awayuki
summary: "Utakata no R: Kakohen Awayuki" is a role-playing game created by "R Man 44", released in 2021.

name: Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth
summary: The epic story of Utawarerumono comes to an end in Mask of Truth, as the fate of the world will be determined by warring nations. The game features exciting SRPG battles, a colorful cast of new/familiar faces that will determine the fate of their world, a rousing original soundtrack, and the dramatic conclusion to the journey of Haku. After the events of Mask of Deception, Haku is destined to rally the nation of Ennakamuy to fight against the evil forces that now control the Yamato throne.

name: Utopia Syndrome
summary: Utopia Syndrome is an adventure game by Andrew Averkin (aka Utopia Games). It is an indie game project that will consist of several chapters, each with its own unique story, characters, time, environments and atmosphere full of adventures, puzzles and quests. It is a new perspective on «point and click» adventure games. Unique visual style and top-down gaming perspective. Immerse yourself in the dark corners of Utopia world to remember your past, present and future

name: Utawarerumono: Past and Present Rediscovered
summary: The Utawarerumono legend reaches a new climax in this sprawling JRPG! As a shadow falls over Yamato once more, Oshtor and friends set out on a fresh adventure—and somewhere, amid white mists, a long slumber approaches its end.

name: Utawarerumono: Zan 2 - Premium Edition
summary:
Utawarerumono: ZAN 2 is a 3D Action RPG playstyle based on Utawarerumono: The Mask of Deception. Introducing new scenarios, the main story, "Hakuoro Arena," is based on Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth and told in a "military chronicle" style. You can play either solo or coop (up to four players online). This mode features exclusive enemies, maps, and more.

The Premium Edition includes:
- Game: Utawarerumono: ZAN 2
- Special Package
- Acrylic Panel
- Complete Soundtrack
- DLC Costume

name: Utopia
summary: Utopia is a city-building strategy simulation game enjoyed with simple rules and casual graphics. Build a city where citizens thrive with happiness on a map made of tiles with various concepts and themes.

name: Utopia 9: A Volatile Vacation
summary: A fast moving, rogue-like 3D twin-stick shooter set on a tragicomic future world. Described as “the ultimate holiday, where nothing is as it seems”, Utopia 9 takes you to the worst possible vacation destination imaginable. Utopia 9 is the absolute definition of false advertising.

name: Utopia no Soubou
summary: Mom, the world is so beautiful.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Live Emotion
summary:
“Uta no Prince-sama” Live & rhythm game by 18 idols!

You can enjoy 3DMV's brilliant performance, a rhythm game that anyone can enjoy, and stories depicting the various appearances of idols.
Go to the exciting stage!

name: Utopia
summary: Utopia is a free adventure game with elements of horror made by Shintaro in RPG Maker VX in 2014, that can be completed in about an hour that leads to three different endings. It was translated to English by Tosiaki and to Portuguese by Sissi and Yuuichi (Zero Corpse).

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Amazing Aria & Sweet Serenade Love
summary: Bundle of both fandiscs.

name: Utility for the Soul
summary: A miniature meditative puzzle experience based on the Lithuanian-American environment artist Aleksandra Kasuba’s concept of the Retreat House - a unique, utopian facility used by large corporations to rejuvenate their overworked employees.

name: Utawarerumono: Lost Flag
summary:
A mobile spin-off featuring over 20 characters from though out the main series.
It uses an auto-battle system with active gauges to trigger attacks from the 5 characters on a team during a battle.

Although the game is not canon, it will explore some of the series lore.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Repeat
summary: Remake of Uta no Prince-sama, with new illustrations, system upgrades, and additional story lines.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Music 2
summary: Second music game of the Uta no Prince-sama series, which contains 33 songs from Uta no Prince-sama Debut, Uta no Prince-sama All Star, and related released CDs.

name: Utherous
summary: Utherous is a sandbox MMORPG that incorporates RTS building and NPC systems.

name: Utawarerumono Zan: Unmasked Edition
summary: Unveil a lost legend in a new light with Utawarerumono: ZAN! This action-packed brawler is a reimagination of the story of Haku, a man with no memories, and the great conflict that consumes the land he calls home. Take control of over 12 legendary heroes from the world of Utawarerumono, and utilize their unique strengths and abilities to engage hordes of enemies in ferocious melee combat. Venture through dynamic battlefields, unleash devastating special moves, and experience a grand tale of war and destiny.

name: Ut: Kissy Cutie
summary: This is a unofficial Undertale fangame, in the style of a dating sim.

name: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen - Premium Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen
- Original TV Anime Blu-ray Disc
- Original Soundtrack
- Visual Book

name: Utopia: The New Worlds
summary: The New Worlds is a data disk add-on to the strategy game Utopia: The Creation of a Nation. It supplies ten new worlds to work through, each of which has a new alien race to encounter. These include the Sarturians, The Rako-Gorda, and a tribe of humans who had previously colonised. The planets themselves also vary in terms of areas to develop.

name: Utacchi
summary: Utacchi is a rhythm video game developed and published by Konami for the Nintendo DS in 2010. It was released exclusively in Japan under the Pop'n Music series. The game plays with the system held in "book style" as the player interacts with falling notes using the stylus. The name 'Utacchi' is a portmanteau of the Japanese words "uta", meaning 'song', and "tachi", a loan word from English meaning 'touch'.

name: Utsurogami
summary:
The main character is a young boy who works for the wealthy Kito family.
The game has two stories, the second of which can only be accessed by picking exact choices.

The first story is about a series of mysterious disappearances of young girls from the same school, which the protagonist investigates with the help of the Kito family's daughter.

Second story is about the village's mountain and coal mine, where an unknown yokai is apparenty roaming. This story features two unique main characters who do not appear in the first. It's also far more sexual and less complex, with each character having a single, straightforward ending.

name: Utopia
summary: Utopia was a browser-based strategy game where each player manages a province within a kingdom, collaborating with other players to grow their territories and strengthen their kingdom. Players build and manage resources like food, housing, and military defenses on their land, and engage in real-time attacks and espionage against other provinces. The game emphasizes teamwork, strategic planning, and timing as players balance growth, defense, and warfare to lead their kingdom to dominance.

name: Utopia No.8
summary: "Utopia No.8" is a MMORPG with a sci-fi, cute style. Players build social circles, gather materials, raise pet PIYA, build houses or open shops, and unleash creativity to construct buildings.

name: Utopias: Navigating Without Coordinates
summary:
Utopias: Navigating Without Coordinates is a videogame network of nine worlds - each one a personal utopia developed by a member of AAA collective.
Is a collective utopia possible?

name: Utter Inverse
summary: Something wicked enters our Dynast's high demesne. UTTER INVERSE - an RPG about the meeting of two points. Salt on your tongue : as the night sky crackles : the SWORD hums in your hands.

name: Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth - Launch Edition
summary:
"The epic story of Utawarerumono comes to an end in Mask of Truth, as the fate of the world will be determined by warring nations. The game features exciting SRPG battles, a colorful cast of new/familiar faces that will determine the fate of their world, a rousing original soundtrack, and the dramatic conclusion to the journey of Haku.

After the events of Mask of Deception, Haku is destined to rally the nation of Ennakamuy to fight against the evil forces that now control the Yamato throne. With everything on the line, Haku and his friends must do everything in their power to ensure that the future of Yamato triumphs over the true evil that lurks in the depth of the darkness."

The launch edition comes with a double-sided pillowcase.

name: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen - Origins Edition
summary: For the first time ever, the origins of the Utawarerumono saga are coming overseas! Prelude to the Fallen follows the story of a man with no memories who awakens in a strange world and is taken in by a tribe of kindhearted beast folk. He is raised as one of their own, eventually earning the name “Hakuoro.” When neighboring nations begin to encroach on his homeland, Hakuoro rises up against the tyrannical invaders, setting himself on an unforgettable journey that lives on in the songs of legend.

name: Utopos
summary: Utopos is a MOSA - Multiplayer Online Space Arena! Gameplay is from a top-down angle, dual-stick shooter and you can play against your friends online, or against AI-controlled opponents.

name: Utawarerumono: Shiro he no Michishirube
summary: Initially announced during the Aquaplus 30th Anniversary livestream and originally slated for 2025, Utawarerumono: Shiro he no Michishirube will release in 2026 and is a sequel to Monochrome Mobius with the same gameplay system but further evolved.

name: Utopia City
summary: Utopia City is a sci-fi FPS game set in the year 2091, in a virtual world parallel to the real world.

name: Utakata no R: Houkai
summary: "Utakata no R: Houkai" is a role-playing game created by "R Man 44", released in 2020.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Sweet Serenade
summary: Spin-off of Uta no Prince-sama, of which characters are in A class in the main series. The game has addition plot of main story line, and contains mini games of new songs.

name: Utopia Process
summary: Pilot two ships to protect the last cities on Earth

name: Utsusemi no Meguri
summary: A otome game for Vita.

name: Utawarerumono Zan: Premium Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Utawarerumono Zan,
Original Soundtrack,
Special Visual Book,
Special Acrylic Character Plate

name: Utakata no Alice: Dolls infeRno
summary: "Utakata no Alice: Dolls infeRno" is a role-playing game created by "R Man 44" in 2021.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Dolce Vita
summary:
Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Dolce Vita, the next game in the visual novel series, was announced in 2016. Originally, it was meant to be released on the PS Vita, but Broccoli announced in 2019 that development for the Vita had been cancelled and that it would continue to be developed for the Nintendo Switch.

Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Dolce Vita will be a completely new work, and will feature a new story about the 11 idols at Shining Agency.

name: Uta Pri Island
summary: Puzzle game application released on iOS and Android devices, with characters from the Uta no Prince-sama franchise.

name: UT Adventure
summary: UT Adventure is a promotional game by Uniqlo made as a part of their Capcom 40th anniversary line. The game was released for mobile browsers, alongside a physical arcade machine for a limited time event at Uniqlo Harajuku and a mini-arcade version that's being released as a part of a giveaway for the event (25-MAR-2024 - 21-APR-2024).

name: Utsukushii Nihongo no Kakikata Hanashikata DS
Uta no Prince-sama: Shining Live
summary: A music rhythm game released on iOS and Android device.

name: Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception - Tamaki Samurai Ver.
summary: Unlock Tamaki Kousaka (Samurai Version) for use in battle in Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception!

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Music 3
summary: Third music game of Uta no Prince-sama series, with new songs from the franchise.

name: Uta Kumi 575
summary: Uta Kumi 575 is a song building action game and combines elements from rhythm game and a word puzzle game. Uta Kumi 575 utilizes Vocaloid voice synthesizers in order to create traditional 5-7-5 tanka and haiku poems.

name: Utaho no Tatari
summary: In this world exists a truth you should not know. You must not touch that truth... Yet still you search. Still you listen. It all started with the disappearance of your grandmother. A broken daily life. A forbidden truth. A cursed reality. Search no further. Come no closer. Lest you be cursed yourself.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Debut
summary: The sequel of the main Uta no Prince-sama series, of which the plot timeline is one year later.

name: Utomah
summary: Utomah is a 2D platformer in which the player navigates through a nightmarish world. Grapple, latch, and dash through incredible environments, discovering the darkness of one's inner mind, encountering true horrors along the way. Prepare to push your skills to the limit!

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Music
summary: First music game of Uta no Prince-sama franchise, which contains 31 songs.

name: Utility Vehicle Simulator
summary: Utility Vehicle Simulator (German: "Sonderfahrzeug-Simulator 2012") is a simulation that lets you complete communal or private assignments. Repairing street lights, cleaning sewers, grooming trees or cordoning off construction sites. 15 missions and a lot of vehicles are included and can be controlled by you. Maintenance as well as financial management are also your responsibilities.

name: Uta Macross Sma-Pho De-Culture
summary: A rhythm game of the Macross franchise, released on iOS and Android devices, to celebrate 35th anniversary of the franchise.

name: Utopia
summary: Utopia is an open world survival game set in a cute and colorful combat zone. Craft your weapons and build your base! Fight for your life against other players or team up and take everyone down, the choice is yours. Who will you become?

name: Utopia: Origin
summary: Utopia: Origin is a survival MMORPG where you get to delve deep into a huge fantasy world and do basically whatever you want: fight against monsters, talk to other players, build all kinds of buildings, explore inhospitable areas, and much more.

name: Utopia: The Creation of a Nation
summary:
Utopia takes the Sim City gameplay concept and adds a military element to it. The game is set in the distant future, where your job is nothing less than Colony Administrator for a new settlement on some far-flung planet. Your aim is to provide the highest Quality of Life rating for the colonists.

You do so by ensuring that there is enough life support, power, housing, employment, police and entertainment to keep the citizens of your colony happy. Hindering your goal are random events such as solar eclipses (which can render your solar panels inactive) and also a different, hostile alien race that inhabits the planets in the many scenarios at offer.

Not only do you have to be a good mayor but you also have to be a good general. Resources must not only be attributed to civilian research but into weapons research, intelligence and the building of tanks and spaceships, if you wish to survive long enough to see your colony flourish into a metropolis. As a rule, you will have built a strong colony before the aliens come, but the final push towards a QOL of 80% or higher can only be achieved once there is no outside threat.

name: Utter Takedown
summary: Utter Takedown is a top-down tactical stealth game set in the 2000s. You have been a hitman for a long time. But after you stopped working with the local mafia, it decided to kidnap your family to get rid of you. Now, your goal is to make utter mafia takedown.

name: Utopia
summary: #Utopia is the land of rainbows, unicorns and other magical creatures. So escape #Dystopia and join us for carrots&apples!

name: Uta no Prince-sama: All Star for Nintendo Switch
summary:
It's been a year and a half since Nanami Haruka graduated from Saotome Shining's school of performing arts. Having signed with Shining Studios, Nanami is constantly looking for her big break, however, it just hasn't come yet, and if she fails to write a brilliant song before the second year is up, her contract will be terminated.

Thirteen Princes are at her rescue, she is going to face a different challenges with each of them. With the senpai idols, she'll have to write something for the music festival, with the teachers from the previous series, she'll have to handle the direction of their changing relationship. And with the seven princes who graduates with her, she will have to write a song for all seven of them, however, her final partner is but one of these princes.

So who is your prince?

name: Utawarerumono
summary: Hakuoro, a man who wakes up in a tiny backwoods village near the mountains with heavy injuries, no memory, and a mask he cannot remove. After being nursed back to health by Eruruw, the girl who found him lying at the point of death in the forest, he starts to view the village as his new home. But when an oppressive ruler threatens the peaceful life of Hakuoro and his newfound friends and family, they find themselves hurtled towards war, chaos, and a destiny far greater than any of them imagined.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: All Star After Secret for Nintendo Switch
summary: A port for Nintendo Switch.

name: Utopia Must Fall
summary: Defend humanity's last metropolis from mysterious alien machinations in this base-defending arcade shooter. Featuring rapid progression, randomly generated attack patterns and laser-sharp retro aesthetics.

name: Uterine Supremacy
summary: Uterine Supremacy is a 4 player local multiplayer game. Take control of the building blocks of life. To battle your friends through inspired mini games for the ultimate prize. Life itself. Inspired by true events.

name: Utopia, an Essay
summary: A brief, experimental exploration/walking game mated to a brief semi-linear essay on futurity, utopia, and space colonization.

name: Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception
summary: Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception is a grand tale that will enchant the hearts and minds of players as it takes them on an incredible journey. With a beautiful visual novel story experience, intriguing characters, fast-paced SRPG combat, world-class soundtrack and more. The game begins atop a snowy mountain where the protagonist awakens in an unfamiliar wilderness, surrounded by deadly creatures, with nothing but a hospital gown and a splitting headache. However, he's rescued by a beautiful girl named Kuon, who sports both adorable animal ears and a beastlike tail. Finding that the hapless man has no memory of anything, Kuon decides to take the amnesiac into her care, naming him Haku.

name: Utawarerumono Trilogy Set
summary: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen, Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception and Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth together as the “Utawarerumono Trilogy Set”.
